mapper.select: select idseccion as codigo, nomseccion as descripcion from seccion order by idciclo;

select c.idcurso as codigo, c.idcarrera as codcarrera, ca.nombre as carrera, c.idciclo as codciclo, ci.nomciclo as ciclo, c.nombre as nombre from curso c inner join carrera ca on c.idcarrera = ca.idcarrera inner join ciclo ci on c.idciclo = ci.idciclo inner join detallecursoseccion ds on c.idcurso = ds.idcurso where ds.idseccion= #{seccion} and ds.idestado = 1 order by c.idciclo ASC;
SELECT idseccion as codigo, idciclo as codciclo, nomseccion as descripcion FROM seccion WHERE idseccion = #{codigo}
SELECT idseccion as codigo, idciclo as codciclo, nomseccion as descripcion FROM seccion WHERE idciclo = #{codciclo} and nomseccion = #{descripcion}
SELECT idcurso as codcur, idseccion as codseccion, idestado as estado FROM detallecursoseccion WHERE idcurso = #{codcur} and idseccion = #{codseccion}
SELECT idseccion as codigo, idciclo as codciclo, nomseccion as descripcion FROM seccion WHERE idciclo = #{codciclo}
mapper.insert: update detallecursoseccion set idestado = 0 where idcurso = #{codcur} and idseccion = #{codseccion}
